Room.Name: Overland Drive/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Waterfront Way and Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive, running north and south, intersects Waterfront Way, running east and west from here. Overland Drive heads north towards the Necropolis and eventually runs between the Necropolis and the eerie Manor of Natasha de Allisk.
